国司: (くにのつかさ) - provincial governor (under the ritsuryo system, any of a group of officials, esp. the director)
国営: (こくえい) - government management; state management
国営テレビ: (こくえいテレビ) - government-run television; public television
国営テレビ局: (こくえいテレビきょく) - state-run television station
国営企業: (こくえいきぎょう) - state-run business
国営企業労働関係法: (こくえいきぎょうろうどうかんけいほう) - National Enterprise Labor Relations Law
国営農場: (こくえいのうじょう) - state-run farm
国営通信: (こくえいつうしん) - government news; state-run news
国営部門: (こくえいぶもん) - public sector (as opposed to private sector)
国土: (くにつち) - country; territory; domain; realm
国土交通大臣: (こくどこうつうだいじん) - Minister of Land, Infrastructure and Transport
国土交通相: (こくどこうつうしょう) - Minister of Land, Infrastructure and Transportation
国土交通省: (こくどこうつうしょう) - Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism
国土地理院: (こくどちりいん) - Geographical Survey Institute
国土安全保障省: (こくどあんぜんほしょうしょう) - Department of Homeland Security; DHS
国土庁: (こくどちょう) - (Japanese) National Land Agency
国土庁長官: (こくどちょうちょうかん) - Director General of National Land Agency
国土計画: (こくどけいかく) - national land planning
国土開発: (こくどかいはつ) - national land development (e.g. building infrastructure, roads, etc.)
国土開発幹線自動車道: (こくどかいはつかんせんじどうしゃどう) - national development arterial expressway
国堺: (くにざかい) - national border; provincial border
国境を侵す: (こっきょうをおかす) - to violate the border; to invade the frontier district
国境を固める: (こっきょうをかためる) - to fortify the frontier
国境地帯: (くにざかいちたい) - border zone
国境紛争: (こっきょうふんそう) - international border dispute
国境警備: (こっきょうけいび) - border security
国境警備兵: (こっきょうけいびへい) - border guard
国境警備隊: (こっきょうけいびたい) - border patrol; border guard; border guards
国境警察: (こっきょうけいさつ) - border police
国士無双: (こくしむそう) - (yoji) distinguished person; {mahj} thirteen orphans/winning hand containing one of each terminal and honor tile plus one extra copy of any of them
国外脱出: (こくがいだっしゅつ) - to flee abroad
国外駐在: (こくがいちゅうざい) - overseas posting; expatriate (employee); expat
国威発揚: (こくいはつよう) - (yoji) enhancing national prestige; expanding national influence
国字: (こくじ) - country's official writing system/native script; kana; kanji that originated in Japan (as opposed to China)
国字問題: (こくじもんだい) - problems pertaining to a nation's script
国学: (こくがく) - study of (ancient) Japanese literature and culture; provincial school (under Japan's ritsuryo system and pre-Sui Chinese law)
国学者: (こくがくしゃ) - scholar of (ancient) Japanese literature and culture
国定公園: (こくていこうえん) - quasi-national park
国定教科書: (こくていきょうかしょ) - national textbooks; textbook published by the government
国家の柱石: (こっかのちゅうせき) - pillar of state
国家をあげて: (こっかをあげて) - as a nation; with the whole country
国家を挙げて: (こっかをあげて) - as a nation; with the whole country
国家主席: (こっかしゅせき) - head of state
国家主権: (こっかしゅけん) - state sovereignty; national sovereignty
国家元首: (こっかげんしゅ) - head of a state
国家元首夫人: (こっかげんしゅふじん) - first lady
国家公務員: (こっかこうむいん) - government official
国家公務員法: (こっかこうむいんほう) - (Japanese) National Civil Service Law
国家公安委員会: (こっかこうあんいいんかい) - National Public Safety Commission
国家公安委員会委員長: (こっかこうあんいいんかいいいんちょう) - National Public Safety Commission Chairman
国家公安委員長: (こっかこうあんいいんちょう) - National Public Safety Commission Chairman
国家地方警察: (こっかちほうけいさつ) - national rural police (established in 1947, abolished in 1954)
国家基幹技術: (こっかきかんぎじゅつ) - National Critical Technology
国家多事: (こっかたじ) - (yoji) eventful times for the nation; the nation being in turmoil; the storm clouds gathering in the land
国家威信: (こっかいしん) - national pride; national prestige
国家存亡: (こっかそんぼう) - (yoji) the fate of a nation; life-or-death (situation) for a nation; national crisis
国家承認: (こっかしょうにん) - diplomatic recognition (of a country)
国家権力: (こっかけんりょく) - power of the state
国家機密: (こっかきみつ) - state secrets; secrets of the state
国家百年の計: (こっかひゃくねんのけい) - permanent national policy
国家社会主義: (こっかしゃかいしゅぎ) - state socialism; Nazism/national socialism
国家経済: (こっかけいざい) - the national economy
国家統制主義: (こっかとうせいしゅぎ) - statism
国家総動員法: (こっかそうどういんほう) - National Mobilization Law
国家行政組織法: (こっかぎょうせいそしきほう) - National Government Organization Law
国家語: (こっかご) - national language; state language
国家財政: (こっかざいせい) - national finance; central government finance
国家賠償: (こっかばいしょう) - state reparations
国家軍政省: (こっかぐんせいしょう) - National Military Establishment; forerunner to the U.S. Department of Defense (1947-1949)
国家転覆: (こっかてんぷく) - subversion (of the state)
国家連合: (こっかれんごう) - federation of states; confederation of nations
